Using I now. Seems to be working well so far.
The app works really well. I'm surprised how fast it is.
Where's the Android app? That would help me.

I want to sign in using Twitter. I don't need to remember another username/password combo.
@leah just noticed that if you try to open a convore URL using the app it opens up safari... Can you guys make it so it opens the respective group or topic... Thanks!
Very nice app!
checking the app now.... any news of an iPad app?

Heard about convore a few days ago. Only trying it now because of the app. Very cool. Funny thing, @bjtitus likes the thin bar. I'd actually like the option for a larger text area when you have more to say. It'll be easier to proof read. :D
So excited to start using the app that I tried to review it before downloading it. Welp.
@djpaine I don't think it's built universal, but you can still scale it up, or use the web client, right? I find that convore on mobile safari is just fine on my ipad.
Testing right away

Very nice
Works on any iOS enabled device with wifi or 3G
Great app but the font is too damn small
@izadcmuda that's why we need an iPad
It's replaced Campfire at the office already. Gonna download and try it out now - hope it's not the pool of poopsauce that is the Campfire iPhone app.
Make to input area expand a bit. One line Is tough to type replies on.

Anything is better than Campfire with the annoying "has left"/"has entered" trail of insane announcements that 37 Signals apparently feels is a strategic part of their product (since they just ignore user requests for a year to make it an option to turn off)
Are there any plans for a Push/Dashboard notification upon updates to a topic?
